Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.data.validation

Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.values.name.Name
      • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.data.validation.Validation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named
    public class Validation
extends Name
    A kind of validation as restricted to a particular set of value types.

    VALIDATE_ALL specifies that values of all types should be validated. Calling include(Class) can specify one or more specific types of values to validate. An object which is Validatable can then implement Validatable.validator(Validation) by returning different Validator implementations depending on the type of Validation requested or by doing validation conditionally depending on what shouldValidate(Class) returns for one or more different target types.

    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    Validatable, Validator
